DOC.brief_summary: OBJECTIVES : I . Compare clinical status pregnant v non-pregnant woman cystic fibrosis . II . Determine glucose tolerance trimester pregnancy woman . III . Evaluate peripheral insulin sensitivity woman . IV . Evaluate whole body protein turnover hepatic glucose production woman . V. Determine rest energy expenditure woman .
DOC.brief_title: Study Metabolic Effects Pregnancy Women With Cystic Fibrosis
DOC.detailed_description: PROTOCOL OUTLINE : Patients undergo glucose tolerance test 3 hour potassium body scan day 1 . Patients undergo indirect calorimetry 20 minute day 2 . Patients receive stable-labeled leucine stable-labeled glucose IV 3 hour follow insulin glucose IV 4-4.5 hour day 2 use hyperinsulinemic euglycemic clamp technique . Blood breath sample collect measure glucose tolerance , peripheral insulin sensitivity , whole body protein turnover . Hepatic glucose production measure mass spectrophotometry . Patients maintain 3-day food journal pregnancy , trimester , pregnancy . Patients undergo study final 2 week trim pregnancy 6 month post-partum .
DOC.criteria: PROTOCOL ENTRY CRITERIA : Disease Characteristics Diagnosis cystic fibrosis ( CF ) pregnant OR Age , weight , body mass index match nonpregnant CF woman pregnant nonCF woman No infection Burkholderia cepacia FEV1 least 60 % Prior/Concurrent Therapy At least 3 week since prior corticosteroid Patient Characteristics Hepatic : No one transaminase level great 10 % normal Other : Pregnant nonCF control : No cigarette smokers No history gestational diabetes mellitus No type 1 2 diabetes No chronic illness
